basics.name: Tsz Ching Wong
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Engineering in the College of Engineering at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Summer, 2023.

highlights: Design, maintain, and update school official website
Help elementary school children learn about Scratch, an introductory interactive programming website for children
Developed a social media analysis platform for DoD clients by providing an interactive dashboard that visualized countries' sentiment scores
Ingested open-source data from Twitter into machine learning models to perform data analysis
Improved data accuracy by removing fake news, filtering out state-owned accounts, and performing multiple sentiment analyses
Worked on semester long project for Navy to revamp their Active Shooter readiness protocols and training
Led market research and use of Mission Model Canvas
Interviewed 50 stakeholders and conducted an employee survey to identify gaps in the current system that led to employees feeling underprepared
Designed an entirely new training system to prepare employees for a crisis situation, including interactive modules, videos, and quizzes
Interacted with clients on problem solving, designing, client feedback and implementing products
Learned customer relations-communication (company stresses the use of customer-based cycle similar to the Agile Development Process Cycle often used by startups)

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
